channel.title: Launching Server, Getting Error
channel.description: This forum is my last hope... Trying to run a 614 on a CentOS 6.0 VPS I fixed all errors that I got until this one.. This is what i get.. [code][16:56:30] [Server] Starting Server Channel Handler... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: dragonkk.rs2rsps.net.ServerChannelHandler at dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server.<init>(Server.java:113) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server.main(Server.java:120) [/code] If anyone could help me, you would make my month!

item.title: Launching Server, Getting Error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“rimv911, post:3, topic:536445”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=655259.msg4387490#msg4387490 date=1386203364]
Recompile your server. it’s missing a .class file the server is trying to load.
[/quote]
The thing is on windows 7 it works perfectly, but on the CentOS vps it give me thi error? Does it has any difference if I compile the server on pc then upload it to vps? Or compile the server in vps?[/quote]
It must be the shell script you have on the vps. CentOS (it I remember correctly) is *Nix so you use shell and not .bat.
Post your run.bat on your win7 computer (the one that works) and the shell script from the CentOS

Read full topic
